get.summary: Gets a page of Roblox.AdConfiguration.Api.SponsoredCampaignModel with specified input parameters.

parameters.description: The id of the campaign target

parameters.name: includeReportingStats
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include reporting stats in the response

parameters.name: isArchived
parameters.description: Indicates whether to retrieve archived ads

parameters.name: pageCursor
parameters.description: The cursor of the page to retrieve. If empty, fetches the first page

Creates a complete ad. Including ad campaign, ad set, escrow, and the ad.
Currently intended for creation of sponsorships only.

Roblox.AdConfiguration.Api.CreateSponsor.description: A request model for creating a sponsored game

targetGender.description: Targeting gender(s) of the ad set ['Undefined' = 1, 'Male' = 2, 'Female' = 4]

targetAgeBracket.description: Targeting age bracket(s) of the ad set ['Undefined' = 1, 'AgeUnder13' = 2, 'Age13OrOver' = 4, 'Age13To16' = 8, 'Age17OrOver' = 16]

startDate.description: The start date of the ad set

endDate.description: The end date of the ad set

targetDeviceType.description: Targeting device type(s) of the ad set ['Undefined' = 1, 'Computer' = 2, 'Phone' = 4, 'Tablet' = 8, 'Console' = 16]

bidAmountInRobux.description: The bid amount of the Ad in Robux

Roblox.AdConfiguration.Api.CreativeModel.description: A model representing an Ad Creative (for example, an ad thumbnail).

creativeId.description: The ID of the creative. Typically, a thumbnail's imageId.

creativeType.description: The type of the ad creative. Typically, CreativeType.Image. ['Undefined' = 0, 'Image' = 1, 'Video' = 2]

Roblox.AdConfiguration.Api.GetSponsoredC.description: A response model for retrieving a page of Roblox.AdConfiguration.Api.SponsoredCampaignModel.

previousPageCursor.description: The cursor for retrieving the previous page, if present.

nextPageCursor.description: The cursor for retrieving the next page, if present.

Roblox.AdConfiguration.Api.GetSponsoredG.description: A response model for retrieving a page of Roblox.AdConfiguration.Api.SponsoredGameV2Model.

previousPageCursor.description: The cursor for retrieving the previous page, if present.

nextPageCursor.description: The cursor for retrieving the next page, if present.

Roblox.AdConfiguration.Api.Models.Campai.description: Represents a sponsored ad campaign target

campaignTargetId.description: The ID of the campaign target

name.description: The name of the campaign target (i.e. the asset name, universe name, group name, etc.)

Roblox.AdConfiguration.Api.Models.Create.description: A request model for creating a sponsored game

campaignTargetId.description: The ID of the campaign target

campaignTargetType.description: The type of the campaign target ['Undefined' = 0, 'Universe' = 1, 'Asset' = 2, 'ImmersiveAd' = 3]

targetGender.description: Targeting gender(s) of the ad set ['Undefined' = 1, 'Male' = 2, 'Female' = 4]

targetAgeBracket.description: Targeting age bracket(s) of the ad set ['Undefined' = 1, 'AgeUnder13' = 2, 'Age13OrOver' = 4, 'Age13To16' = 8, 'Age17OrOver' = 16]

startDate.description: The start date of the ad set

endDate.description: The end date of the ad set

targetDeviceType.description: Targeting device type(s) of the ad set ['Undefined' = 1, 'Computer' = 2, 'Phone' = 4, 'Tablet' = 8, 'Console' = 16]

campaignName.description: The name of the Campaign / Ad

dailyBidAmountInRobux.description: The daily bid amount for the campaign / ad, in Robux

placementLocation.description: The location to place the campaign ['Undefined' = 1, 'GameSort' = 2, 'AvatarShop' = 4, 'ItemDetails' = 8, 'HomePage' = 16, 'Billboard300x250' = 32, 'Billboard600x300' = 64, 'Billboard300x600' = 128]

Roblox.AdConfiguration.Api.Models.GetCam.description: The response model which returns a collection of Roblox.AdConfiguration.Api.Models.CampaignTargetModel

campaignTargetModels.description: Gets or sets a collection of Roblox.AdConfiguration.Api.Models.CampaignTargetModel

Roblox.AdConfiguration.Api.Models.GetEli.description: A model represents a request to stop a sponsored campaign / ad.

campaignTargetTypes.description: The list of campaign types we want to include in the results

Roblox.AdConfiguration.Api.Models.GetRec.description: The response model for getting a list of recent-ads-ranked universes.

universes.description: Gets or sets a list of Roblox.AdConfiguration.Api.Models.UniverseModel.

Roblox.AdConfiguration.Api.Models.StopSp.description: A model represents a request to stop a sponsored campaign / ad.

adSetId.description: The ID of the ad set to stop.

Roblox.AdConfiguration.Api.Models.StopSp.description: A model represents a request to stop a sponsored game ad.

adSetId.description: Gets the ID of the ad set to stop.

Roblox.AdConfiguration.Api.Models.Univer.description: Represents a universe in API endpoint results.

Roblox.AdConfiguration.Api.SponsoredCamp.description: A response model represents an Ad with complete information, including infos from its associated campaign and ad set

adSetId.description: The id of the ad set

creativeType.description: The type of the creative associated with the Ad ['Undefined' = 0, 'Image' = 1, 'Video' = 2]

creativeTargetId.description: The target id of the creative associated with the Ad

bidAmountInRobux.description: The bid amount of the Ad in Robux

budgetInRobux.description: The budget of the ad set in Robux

adSetStatus.description: The status of the ad set ['Undefined' = 0, 'Draft' = 1, 'Scheduled' = 2, 'Running' = 3, 'Paused' = 4, 'Stopped' = 5, 'Completed' = 6]

startDate.description: The start date of the ad set

endDate.description: The end date of the ad set

targetGender.description: The target gender of the ad set ['Undefined' = 1, 'Male' = 2, 'Female' = 4]

targetAgeBracket.description: The target age bracket of the ad set ['Undefined' = 1, 'AgeUnder13' = 2, 'Age13OrOver' = 4, 'Age13To16' = 8, 'Age17OrOver' = 16]

targetDeviceType.description: The target device type of the ad set ['Undefined' = 1, 'Computer' = 2, 'Phone' = 4, 'Tablet' = 8, 'Console' = 16]

campaignTargetType.description: The target type of the campaign ['Undefined' = 0, 'Universe' = 1, 'Asset' = 2, 'ImmersiveAd' = 3]

campaignTargetId.description: The target id of the campaign

totalSpendInRobux.description: The total spend of the ad set in Robux

totalImpressions.description: The total number of impressions generated by the ad

totalClicks.description: The total number of clicks generated by the ad

totalConversions.description: The total number of conversions generated by the ad

impressionConversions.description: The number of conversions by ad impression generated by the ad

clickConversions.description: The number of conversions by ad click generated by the ad

Roblox.AdConfiguration.Api.SponsoredGame.description: A response model represents an Ad with complete information, including infos from its associated campaign and ad set

adSetId.description: The id of the ad set

creativeType.description: The type of the creative associated with the Ad ['Undefined' = 0, 'Image' = 1, 'Video' = 2]

creativeTargetId.description: The target id of the creative associated with the Ad

bidAmountInRobux.description: The bid amount of the Ad in Robux

budgetInRobux.description: The budget of the ad set in Robux

adSetStatus.description: The status of the ad set ['Undefined' = 0, 'Draft' = 1, 'Scheduled' = 2, 'Running' = 3, 'Paused' = 4, 'Stopped' = 5, 'Completed' = 6]

startDate.description: The start date of the ad set

endDate.description: The end date of the ad set

targetGender.description: The target gender of the ad set ['Undefined' = 1, 'Male' = 2, 'Female' = 4]

targetAgeBracket.description: The target age bracket of the ad set ['Undefined' = 1, 'AgeUnder13' = 2, 'Age13OrOver' = 4, 'Age13To16' = 8, 'Age17OrOver' = 16]

targetDeviceType.description: The target device type of the ad set ['Undefined' = 1, 'Computer' = 2, 'Phone' = 4, 'Tablet' = 8, 'Console' = 16]

campaignTargetType.description: The target type of the campaign ['Undefined' = 0, 'Universe' = 1, 'Asset' = 2, 'ImmersiveAd' = 3]

campaignTargetId.description: The target id of the campaign

totalSpendInRobux.description: The total spend of the ad set in Robux

totalImpressions.description: The total number of impressions generated by the ad

totalClicks.description: The total number of clicks generated by the ad

totalConversions.description: The total number of conversions generated by the ad
